description: This file defines a Fragment for an Android TV application using the Leanback library. It creates a home screen with sections for featured content, categories, and live TV, with custom card presentation including rounded corners, focus effects, and overlay gradients. It manages dynamic data loading via a repository and handles user interactions for navigation to detail, search, and live TV screens.

classes.name: HomeBrowseFragment
classes.description: Main Fragment displaying a categorized list of content with a featured section and handling user interaction.

classes.name: SimpleCard
classes.description: A data class representing a simple card with a title and subtitle used for static options.

classes.name: CardPresenter
classes.description: Custom Presenter for rendering content and simple cards with rounded corners, focus effects, and overlay styling.

classes.name: HomeViewModel
classes.description: A stub ViewModel for managing UI-related data; currently with minimal implementation.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and initializes the ViewHolder for card items, applying styles, overlay, labels, and focus animations.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds ContentItem or SimpleCard data to the ViewHolder views, loading images and setting text.

methods.name: onUnbindViewHolder
methods.description: Performs cleanup when the ViewHolder is unbound (no specific logic here).
